Body: I was installing CyanogenMod when something went wrong and now my phone will only boot to recovery mode. I had made a backup but it somehow got deleted, I don't know why that happened. My computer doesn't recognize my phone when I connect it.My phone is the Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini and I used ClockworkMod recovery. What can I do now, to fix my phone?
Title: Galaxy S3 mini only boots to recovery - how can I fix it?

history.Text: I'm really afraid now! I was installing cyanogenmod but something went wrong and now my phone is hasn't got any os to run! It boots to recovery mode. Firstly I had got a backup! But it deleted with no reason! I can't connect my phone to computer to move any rom!Please help me! I'm use CMW! My phone is SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 MINI.Is there anybody who can help?
My phone hasn't got any os!

**Problem**I was installing CyanogenMod when something went wrong and now my phone will only boot to recovery mode.  I had a backup made but it got deleted somehow, no known reason why that happened.  My computer doesn't recognize my phone when I connect it.My phone is the Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini.  I used clockworkmod recovery!  What can I do now, to fix my phone?
